mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comu_post ( comu_no, title, content,writer,regdate ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(comu_no)+1, 1)FROM comu_post), #{title}, #{content},(select userid from member where NICKNAME=#{writer}), sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE comu_post SET viewcnt=viewcnt+1 WHERE comu_no = #{comu_no}
UPDATE comu_post SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer} WHERE comu_no = #{comu_no}
mapper.select: select nickname from comu_post left join member on comu_post.writer = member.userid
